entry.title: State emergency management looking to partner with local businesses

entry.summary: Douglas County payroll employment increased a seasonally adjusted 170 jobs in December after a gain of 50 in November and a decrease of 250 in October.

entry.title: Glide Wildflower Show accepting volunteers
entry.summary: GLIDE — The Glide Wildflower Show is accepting volunteers for its April 27 and 28 showcase. Several opportunities require no knowledge of botany or flowers, though those positions need help, too.

entry.title: Douglas County Animal Control Deputy retires after 33 years
entry.summary: Lee Bartholomew said he feels plenty comfortable with humans, but is way more comfortable with animals, so comfortable he spent 33 years as a Douglas County Animal Control Deputy.

entry.title: Library to host cultural event
entry.summary: ROSEBURG — Roseburg Public Library will be hosting a Charreria program from 6:30 p.m.-8:30 p.m. Feb. 1. A Charreria is a the 500-year-old practice of horsemanship and roping, and became Mexico's national sport in 1933.
